parse

public boolean parse(byte[] raw)
Description copied from class: ArtNetPacket
Parses the given byte array into semantic values and populates type specific fields for each packet type. Implementing classes do not need to check the packet header anymore since this has already been done at this stage.

Specified by:
parse in class ArtNetPacket
Returns:
true, if there were no parse errors
